author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 46{+t}{+h}jeer of Ahobila Mutt will be camping on the Mutt premises in Triplicane till Wednesday.

A press release from the Ahobila Mutt said devotees can visit the mutt and seek the jeer’s blessings.

On Monday and Tuesday, devotees can see 'Thiruvaradhanam' at the sannadhi in the mutt, located on Car Street.
title: Jeer in Triplicane
